When I look at the Modules page of a new crawl job, I see links to
remove a=
nd reorder various modules, like this:

>>>
Select Pre Processors Processor=
s that should run before any fetching
org.archive.crawler.prefetch.Preselec=
tor Down Remove Info
org.archive.crawler.prefetch.PreconditionEnforcer Up R=
emove Info
>>>

But if I remove one, I have no way to add it again.  Is the=
re
something terribly obvious that I am missing?   I'm running 1.6.0
(sourc=
e, in Eclipse, using '-Dheritrix.development').

Regards,
Kjerken
